column4: Does anyone know a good software KM switch that works between Ubunto and Windows? Is there one?

Keyboard/Mouse only, Treats multiple computers as seperate monitors connected to one machine essentially. eg. you can move your mouse off the left side of the screen to another monitor with windows on it and use it there
x2vnc/x2x/win2x is a software solultion if you have 2 mionitors but like only one kb and mouse
I'll take a look, I'm just looking for a KM, not a KVM :)
